description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Lille vs Montpellier in the Ligue 1
title: Lille vs Montpellier: Ligue 1 stats & head-to-head
title_page: Lille vs Montpellier: Ligue 1 stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport
maintext:
Post
Attempt saved. Matias Fernandez-Pardo (Lille) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Benjamin André with a headed pass.
Post
Fourth official has announced 4 minutes of added time.
Post
Attempt missed. Othmane Maamma (Montpellier) right footed shot from the left side of the box is too high. Assisted by Wahbi Khazri.
Booking
Bafodé Diakité (Lille) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
